Posts.Content: Can anyone tell me if bloody discharge from my nipple should be expected 5 days after a biopsy? I tried to contact the radiologist who did the test, but only got the on-call who wasn't familiar with my particular procedure. The biopsy was not done near the nipple.
Posts.Title: Bleeding After Biopsy

Posts.Content: Thanks, Nancy. This was u/s guided core biopsy. All is well - just complex cysts. Wish they would have given me ANY information on what to expect post-procedure besides bruising and small discomfort. I really didn't expect the bleeding.
Posts.Title: Bleeding After Biopsy

Posts.Content: I had a core needle biopsy almost two weeks ago. Since then I have had a rusty brown fluid that I can aspirate - I didn't have that before. I was told not to worry about this unless it didn't go away after a while. It's possible that the fluid color may simply be a result of having the previous tumor removed. You should check this possibility with your doctor.
Posts.Title: Rusty Brown Aspirated Cyst
